ID: 745
Title: DROP PARTITION does not work
Description:
```
SELECT 
    partition, 
    name
FROM system.parts 
WHERE active

┌─partition─┬─name────────────────────────────┐
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6306_6382_4   │
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6384_6416_3   │
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6418_6450_3   │
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6452_6452_0   │
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6456_6456_0   │
│ 201607    │ 20160709_20160717_2_4578_7      │
│ 201607    │ 20160701_20160722_4580_8870_7   │
│ 201607    │ 20160722_20160729_8872_13109_7  │
│ 201607    │ 20160701_20160731_13110_16819_7 │
│ 201607    │ 20160704_20160708_16820_19220_6 │
│ 201607    │ 20160708_20160709_19222_19462_5 │
│ 201607    │ 20160709_20160709_19464_19642_4 │
│ 201607    │ 20160709_20160731_19644_20426_4 │
│ 201607    │ 20160731_20160731_20428_20428_0 │
│ 201608    │ 20160801_20160825_19664_23970_7 │
│ 201608    │ 20160801_20160831_23972_28450_7 │
│ 201608    │ 20160802_20160831_28452_32470_7 │
│ 201608    │ 20160809_20160809_32472_32682_5 │
│ 201608    │ 20160809_20160809_32684_32898_5 │
│ 201608    │ 20160809_20160831_32900_39532_3 │
│ 201608    │ 20160831_20160831_39534_39598_3 │
│ 201608    │ 20160831_20160831_39600_39626_2 │
│ 201608    │ 20160831_20160831_39628_39628_0 │
│ 201608    │ 20160831_20160831_39632_39632_0 │
│ 201609    │ 20160909_20160916_32922_37476_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160901_20160921_37478_41690_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160921_20160927_41693_45386_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160901_20160930_45388_48568_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160903_20160907_48570_51646_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160907_20160908_51648_52248_6 │
│ 201609    │ 20160908_20160909_52250_52850_5 │
│ 201609    │ 20160909_20160909_52852_53028_4 │
│ 201609    │ 20160909_20160930_53030_65093_5 │
│ 201609    │ 20160930_20160930_65094_65100_1 │
│ 201610    │ 20161001_20161031_57672_77638_8 │
│ 201610    │ 20161007_20161008_77640_78298_6 │
│ 201610    │ 20161008_20161009_78300_79216_6 │
│ 201610    │ 20161009_20161009_79218_79294_4 │
│ 201610    │ 20161009_20161009_79297_79306_1 │
│ 201610    │ 20161009_20161009_79308_79314_1 │
└───────────┴─────────────────────────────────┘

ALTER TABLE actions DROP PARTITION '201610';

SELECT 
    partition, 
    name
FROM system.parts 
WHERE active

┌─partition─┬─name────────────────────────────┐
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6306_6382_4   │
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6384_6416_3   │
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6418_6450_3   │
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6452_6452_0   │
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6456_6456_0   │
│ 201607    │ 20160709_20160717_2_4578_7      │
│ 201607    │ 20160701_20160722_4580_8870_7   │
│ 201607    │ 20160722_20160729_8872_13109_7  │
│ 201607    │ 20160701_20160731_13110_16819_7 │
│ 201607    │ 20160704_20160708_16820_19220_6 │
│ 201607    │ 20160708_20160709_19222_19462_5 │
│ 201607    │ 20160709_20160709_19464_19642_4 │
│ 201607    │ 20160709_20160731_19644_20426_4 │
│ 201607    │ 20160731_20160731_20428_20428_0 │
│ 201608    │ 20160801_20160825_19664_23970_7 │
│ 201608    │ 20160801_20160831_23972_28450_7 │
│ 201608    │ 20160802_20160831_28452_32470_7 │
│ 201608    │ 20160809_20160809_32472_32682_5 │
│ 201608    │ 20160809_20160809_32684_32898_5 │
│ 201608    │ 20160809_20160831_32900_39532_3 │
│ 201608    │ 20160831_20160831_39534_39598_3 │
│ 201608    │ 20160831_20160831_39600_39626_2 │
│ 201608    │ 20160831_20160831_39628_39628_0 │
│ 201608    │ 20160831_20160831_39632_39632_0 │
│ 201609    │ 20160909_20160916_32922_37476_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160901_20160921_37478_41690_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160921_20160927_41693_45386_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160901_20160930_45388_48568_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160903_20160907_48570_51646_7 │
│ 201609    │ 20160907_20160908_51648_52248_6 │
│ 201609    │ 20160908_20160909_52250_52850_5 │
│ 201609    │ 20160909_20160909_52852_53028_4 │
│ 201609    │ 20160909_20160930_53030_65093_5 │
│ 201609    │ 20160930_20160930_65094_65100_1 │
└───────────┴─────────────────────────────────┘
```
Looks like it works fine, but after restarting the server the partition exist again.

sudo service clickhouse-server stop
sudo service clickhouse-server start

```
SELECT 
    partition, 
    name
FROM system.parts 
WHERE active

┌─partition─┬─name────────────────────────────┐
│ 201606    │ 20160630_20160630_6306_6382_4   │
```
